meanings.sent1: The unbranched road led straight to the town.
meanings.sent2: The plant had unbranched stems reaching towards the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The unbranched tree looked like a giant green pencil standing tall.
meanings.sent4: Her unbranched thoughts flowed in a clear, linear path.
meanings.sent5: The unbranched path through the forest was easy to follow.

meanings.definition: Having a single main stem or trunk.
meanings.sent1: The unbranched river flowed steadily through the valley.
meanings.sent2: The unbranched tree stood proudly in the center of the garden.
meanings.sent3: The unbranched vine wrapped around the fence like a green snake.
meanings.sent4: His unbranched argument was concise and to the point.
meanings.sent5: The unbranched tower soared high above the city skyline.
